info.name: G+ Google Plus - Red and black
info.description:
***********NOT WORK***********
"G+ Google Plus - Red and black"
Work good is Google Chrome.
Half worked is Firefox.
Background black, all red and black, little gray.

If you have a color problem in Google Chrome badly done then disable and enable it later will be perfect.
***********NOT WORK***********

to red, more red.

Thanks Kurayami ;)
